tool.name: Seurat Export2CellBrowser
tool.description: produces files for UCSC CellBrowser import.
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool converts a Seurat object (hopefully with t-SNE results) and its accompanying marker genes file (optional) to a tar that can be feed to the UCSC CellBrowser tool.
@SEURAT_INTRO@
-----
**Inputs**
* RDS object
-----
**Outputs**
* Text file
.. _Seurat: https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.4096 .. _Satija Lab: https://satijalab.org/seurat/
